body_content.explanation: opposing fascism (= a political system based on a very powerful leader, state control with no political opposition allowed, and being extremely proud of your country and race):
examples: Anti-fascist campaigners said they were convinced that the organization was a front for the ultra-right wing British National Party.
My parents organised the Anti-Nazi League, so there was a lot of antifascist activity at home.

body_content.explanation: a person who opposes fascism (= a political system based on a very powerful leader, state control with no political opposition allowed, and being extremely proud of your country and race):
examples: As an anti-fascist and feminist, she wrote highly political novels.
He was a Jewish anti-Fascist who fled Mussolini's regime.
